lex.text: The 11th Mississippi Infantry monument is located in the municipality of Gettysburg, Adams County, Pennsylvania. Adams County is east of Franklin County and south of Cumberland County. Maryland's Carrol county is located to the southeast.

lex.text: The Baku Turkish Martyrs' Memorial in Azerbaijan is dedicated to the Ottoman Army Soldiers killed in the Battle of Baku and was designed by Huseyin Butuner and Hilmi Guner. The monument is also known by the native name Türk Şehitleri Anıtı. Azerbaijan's leader is Artur Rasizade.
